subject: Fix chat list not updating on navigation - add web support
body:
- Add console logging to debug refetch timing
- Add web-specific useEffect to refetch on component mount
- Improve useFocusEffect to work better on web platform
- Add logging in useChats to track fetch operations
- Ensure chat list updates when navigating back from chat screen
